1{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Patterns for token tree.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree.Pattern
7  ( pattern L,
8    pattern B,
9    pattern LText,
10    pattern LRaw,
11    pattern LQq,
12  ) where
13
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token            as S
16
17-- | Token leaf.
18pattern L tok <- B.TreeL tok
19
20-- | Token branch.
21pattern B b xs <- B.TreeB b _ xs
22
23-- | Text leaf.
24pattern LText f s <- L (S.TText _ f s)
25
26-- | Raw text leaf.
27pattern LRaw s <- LText S.TextRaw s
28
29-- | Double-quoted text leaf.
30pattern LQq s <- LText S.TextQQ s
31
